resources.string: "Choose applications you don't want to be displayed on the widget"
Turn on to populate the widget automatically with most frequently used applications
Turn off to add the applications manually to the widget
Manually select applications to populate the widget
Color or texture will be used as shortcuts background
Erase all applications on the widget
This action will reset the widget, erasing all application shortcuts. Reset widget?
This is the activity graph widget, a cool way to find your favorite applications easily on your homescreen
You can choose your preferred way to populate this widget:
You have chosen automatic setup. Right after you start using the applications on your phone, this widget will be automatically updated with your most used applications.
You can change this preference in the widget settings. Widget settings can be found through widget setting button on the upper right corner of widget.
Touch to start adding applications to the widget.
Widget settings can be found through widget setting button on the upper right corner of widget.
Automatically. It will be automatically populated by your most used applications
Manually. You will add the applications manually to the widget
Use the graph to choose 9 applications to populate your widget.You\'ll have easy access to these applications right on your homescreen panel.
